channel.title: Woks Like A Charm
channel.description: A blog to write about cooking and record delicious Chinese fusion recipes.

item.title: Welcome to Woks Like A Charm!
item.description:
Welcome to the blog!

Hereâ€™s how to make a delicious hard boiled egg:

Ingredients

  • A few eggs, raw
  • Water
  1. Put the eggs into cold tap water and heat on medium high.
  2. As soon as the water starts simmering, turn off the stove and remove the pot from the heat. Keep the lid of the pot closed.
  3. For soft boiled eggs, wait 5 minutes. For hard boiled eggs, wait 7 minutes.
  4. Remove the eggs from the pot. Rinse briefly with cold tap water which helps peeling. Enjoy with some salt and pepper.
